snippet: Airman Stone, who helped subdue a gunman on a Paris-bound train in August, was in stable condition after being attacked in Sacramento, an Air Force official said.

byline.original: By JONAH BROMWICH and DANIEL VICTOR

abstract: Sacramento officials say Airman First Class Spencer Stone was stabbed and is in stable condition after suffering significant but non-life-threatening wounds in altercation outside a bar; Stone helped stop terrorist attack in Paris in August, but officials say attack was unrelated to that event.
lead_paragraph: Airman Stone, who helped subdue a gunman on a Paris-bound train in August, was in stable condition after being attacked in Sacramento, an Air Force official said.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Airman Who Helped Foil Train Attack Is Stabbed
headline.main: Spencer Stone, Airman Who Foiled Terrorist Attack, Is Stabbed
